data.text: Fua～aaaah… Mornin'～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Fua～aaaah… Mornin'～

data.text:
Sei-chan, good morning! You look sleepy again today, 
though I guess you're always sleepy.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Sei-chan, good morning! You look sleepy again today, 
<story>though I guess you're always sleepy.

data.text:
It seems like you slipped in something rude at 
the end there though… Well, it's because it's 
been getting warmer lately, you see～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>It seems like you slipped in something rude at 
<story>the end there though… Well, it's because it's 
<story>been getting warmer lately, you see～.

data.text:
Lately training has really left me worn 
out, so at night I'm out like a light.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Lately training has really left me worn 
<story>out, so at night I'm out like a light.

data.text:
Earlier in the dressing room by the baths, I fell asleep after 
stepping on to the scale, and everyone saw how much I weighed…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Earlier in the dressing room by the baths, I fell asleep after 
<story>stepping on to the scale, and everyone saw how much I weighed…

data.text: That's quite a skillful way to get some sleep, huh…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>That's quite a skillful way to get some sleep, huh…

data.text: At long last, I'm baaaaack―!!
data.processed: <story>At long last, I'm baaaaack―!!

data.text: Hey everyone, it's been a while!
data.processed: <story>Hey everyone, it's been a while!

data.text:
Eh…? Oh-Oh?! 
Tsuru-chan?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Eh…? Oh-Oh?! 
<story>Tsuru-chan?!

data.text: Yeah! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi has returned!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Yeah! Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi has returned!

data.text:
Ooooh～ It's been a while～! 
So starting today, you're going to be attending again.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Ooooh～ It's been a while～! 
<story>So starting today, you're going to be attending again.

data.text:
Isn't that great, Tsuru-chan?! 
Are you feeling better now?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Isn't that great, Tsuru-chan?! 
<story>Are you feeling better now?

data.text:
Of course, I'm all good! I got a good long rest 
so I've got a lot of power saved up!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Of course, I'm all good! I got a good long rest 
<story>so I've got a lot of power saved up!

data.text:
Just because it's saved up, don't push yourself okay? 
After all, before you took that break―
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Just because it's saved up, don't push yourself okay? 
<story>After all, before you took that break―

data.text:
Uuuu… even though everyone else has already had their debut 
race, I'm now the only one that hasn't run in a race yet…
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Uuuu… even though everyone else has already had their debut 
<story>race, I'm now the only one that hasn't run in a race yet…

data.text:
It can't be helped though, your body's been in bad shape… 
from now on let's do our best!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>It can't be helped though, your body's been in bad shape… 
<story>from now on let's do our best!

data.text:
…Yeah, you're right! After all that time lost, 
I need to catch up to everyone!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>…Yeah, you're right! After all that time lost, 
<story>I need to catch up to everyone!

data.text:
Besides, the once-in-a-lifetime chance to run in the Classic 
races is coming up! Just like President Rudolf, I want to shine 
as an Uma Musume on that big stage!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Besides, the once-in-a-lifetime chance to run in the Classic 
<story>races is coming up! Just like President Rudolf, I want to shine 
<story>as an Uma Musume on that big stage!

data.text: Let's all run together in the Classic races!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Let's all run together in the Classic races!

data.text:
Spe-chan, thank you! Alright, it's a promise, okay?! 
Tsuyoshi, will absolutely do her best!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan, thank you! Alright, it's a promise, okay?! 
<story>Tsuyoshi, will absolutely do her best!

data.text: You're still recovering, so don't push yourself too hard～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>You're still recovering, so don't push yourself too hard～

data.text:
I'll be fine～! It's more like I've got more 
power than I know what to do with～!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>I'll be fine～! It's more like I've got more 
<story>power than I know what to do with～!

data.text: Ze～… haa～…! Ze～… haa～…!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Ze～… haa～…! Ze～… haa～…!

data.text:
Fuhii～… I'm all… tapped out… 
I can't go any further～… flop.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Fuhii～… I'm all… tapped out… 
<story>I can't go any further～… flop.

data.text: Ueeee～?! Tsuru-chan?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ueeee～?! Tsuru-chan?!

data.text: Something like that… did happen didn't it?
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed: <story>Something like that… did happen didn't it?

data.text:
Before the Classic races started, I was somehow able to make it 
back in time but, in the end, my debut race ended up being after 
the [Satsuki Sho] will be over.
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>Before the Classic races started, I was somehow able to make it 
<story>back in time but, in the end, my debut race ended up being after 
<story>the [Satsuki Sho] will be over.

data.text: Tsuru-chan…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Tsuru-chan…

data.text:
But, but, but! The Classic races, 
the [Derby] and [Kika Sho], are still an option!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>But, but, but! The Classic races, 
<story>the [Derby] and [Kika Sho], are still an option!

data.text:
I'll definitely catch up to you so, both 
of you, do your best at [Satsuki Sho]!
data.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
data.processed:
<story>I'll definitely catch up to you so, both 
<story>of you, do your best at [Satsuki Sho]!

data.text:
Yeah! I'll be sure to work hard enough so I won't lose to 
Tsuru-chan! Allllright, after today's training I think I'll do 
some independent training!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah! I'll be sure to work hard enough so I won't lose to 
<story>Tsuru-chan! Allllright, after today's training I think I'll do 
<story>some independent training!

data.text: …Really, you're always doing your best, aren't you～, Spe-chan?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…Really, you're always doing your best, aren't you～, Spe-chan?

data.text: ―Alright, it's done Sky!
data.processed: <story>―Alright, it's done Sky!

data.text: Unyuu…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Unyuu…?

data.text: Oh, sorry, sorry, I guess you were asleep.
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed: <story>Oh, sorry, sorry, I guess you were asleep.

data.text:
…For some reason, Gramps always smells like the sun, 
so whenever I'm near you I start feeling sleepy, I can't help it.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>…For some reason, Gramps always smells like the sun, 
<story>so whenever I'm near you I start feeling sleepy, I can't help it.

data.text:
Haa Haa Haa! Is that right, I smell like the sun! 
That aside, Sky, the lure's done!
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed:
<story>Haa Haa Haa! Is that right, I smell like the sun! 
<story>That aside, Sky, the lure's done!

data.text:
Uwaa! Thanks, Gramps!! 
Hey hey, let's head to the river now!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Uwaa! Thanks, Gramps!! 
<story>Hey hey, let's head to the river now!

data.text:
C'mon now, the sun's already setting, you know? It can be 
dangerous at night, so we can go fishing tomorrow, okay?
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed:
<story>C'mon now, the sun's already setting, you know? It can be 
<story>dangerous at night, so we can go fishing tomorrow, okay?

data.text: Eeeeeh～… but I want to try out Gramps' lure though…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Eeeeeh～… but I want to try out Gramps' lure though…

data.text: One of the basics of fishing is to never lose your cool.
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed: <story>One of the basics of fishing is to never lose your cool.

data.text: It's the same with running.
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed: <story>It's the same with running.

data.text: The same as running…?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>The same as running…?

data.text:
For example, even if your friends are faster than 
you now, if you stay cool and steady, and keep working 
hard at your own pace, it'll all be fine!
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed:
<story>For example, even if your friends are faster than 
<story>you now, if you stay cool and steady, and keep working 
<story>hard at your own pace, it'll all be fine!

data.text:
You see, Gramps' dream is that when Sky grows up, 
I'll get the chance to see you run in a Classic race!
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed:
<story>You see, Gramps' dream is that when Sky grows up, 
<story>I'll get the chance to see you run in a Classic race!

data.text:
And if that happens, and I get to see you win, 
you have no idea how happy that'll make me-
data.name: Sky's Grandpa
data.processed:
<story>And if that happens, and I get to see you win, 
<story>you have no idea how happy that'll make me-

data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: …Oops, guess I dozed off for too long.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…Oops, guess I dozed off for too long.

data.text:
Ah～ahh, the sun's already setting isn't it? 
It's your fault because the weather was too good, Mr. Sun.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Ah～ahh, the sun's already setting isn't it? 
<story>It's your fault because the weather was too good, Mr. Sun.

data.text: The return trip's 60km… I wonder if I'll make it before curfew～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>The return trip's 60km… I wonder if I'll make it before curfew～

data.text:
Soon the curtain will rise, on the first leg of the 
Triple Crown, the Classic race, [Satsuki Sho].
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Soon the curtain will rise, on the first leg of the 
<story>Triple Crown, the Classic race, [Satsuki Sho].

data.text:
The favorite is Special Week! Following that, Seiun Sky and King 
Halo, the top 3 contenders, round out the popularity rankings!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>The favorite is Special Week! Following that, Seiun Sky and King 
<story>Halo, the top 3 contenders, round out the popularity rankings!

data.text:
And so, the Uma Musume slowly make their way 
from the paddock, one step at a time, as if basking in the 
feeling as they approach the course of this grand stage!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And so, the Uma Musume slowly make their way 
<story>from the paddock, one step at a time, as if basking in the 
<story>feeling as they approach the course of this grand stage!

data.text:
Among those called the "Golden Generation", which Uma Musume 
will be the one to take hold of glory and claim victory?!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Among those called the "Golden Generation", which Uma Musume 
<story>will be the one to take hold of glory and claim victory?!

data.text:
Focus, focus… the course is the same as the 
[Yayoi Sho] so, this time too, for sure…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Focus, focus… the course is the same as the 
<story>[Yayoi Sho] so, this time too, for sure…!

data.text: Oh man～ it's finally here, a Classic race.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Oh man～ it's finally here, a Classic race.

data.text:
There's so many fans so, the excitement in the air… 
it's on another level from any race up until now…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>There's so many fans so, the excitement in the air… 
<story>it's on another level from any race up until now…!

data.text:
But, it's the first race of the Triple Crown! 
I definitely have to win it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But, it's the first race of the Triple Crown! 
<story>I definitely have to win it!

data.text: Ooh, you're really fired up, aren't ya～?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Ooh, you're really fired up, aren't ya～?

data.text:
Now that I think about it, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― 
is the dream left to you by your Moms, wasn't it?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Now that I think about it, "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"― 
<story>is the dream left to you by your Moms, wasn't it?

data.text:
Yeah, it was entrusted to me by both of my Moms 
so it's a really important dream!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it was entrusted to me by both of my Moms 
<story>so it's a really important dream!

data.text:
A dream entrusted to you, huh… to tell the truth, 
I have one too. A dream entrusted to me.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>A dream entrusted to you, huh… to tell the truth, 
<story>I have one too. A dream entrusted to me.

data.text: Sei-chan has one too…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Sei-chan has one too…?

data.text:
Gramps is really looking forward to it, you know～, 
seeing me as I win a Classic race.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Gramps is really looking forward to it, you know～, 
<story>seeing me as I win a Classic race.

data.text:
So that's how it is! In that case, just like me, Sei-chan has 
her Grandpa's dream that she's working hard for!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>So that's how it is! In that case, just like me, Sei-chan has 
<story>her Grandpa's dream that she's working hard for!

data.text:
Well no～, that's a little off. It's true that 
I'm carrying Gramps' expecations, but you see-
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Well no～, that's a little off. It's true that 
<story>I'm carrying Gramps' expecations, but you see-

data.text:
The reason I run, in the end, it's for my own sake. That's why 
it's a little different from Spe-chan's, I guess.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>The reason I run, in the end, it's for my own sake. That's why 
<story>it's a little different from Spe-chan's, I guess.

data.text: …Eh?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…Eh?

data.text:
Even if Gramps had said it was fine if I didn't 
want to run, I would still run.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Even if Gramps had said it was fine if I didn't 
<story>want to run, I would still run.

data.text:
If you can't understand that difference, 
then I'll be the one who's definitely going to win.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>If you can't understand that difference, 
<story>then I'll be the one who's definitely going to win.

data.text: The [Satsuki Sho]…I will win, without fail.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>The [Satsuki Sho]…I will win, without fail.

data.text:
Or something like that～. 
Nihihi, well then, see ya out there～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Or something like that～. 
<story>Nihihi, well then, see ya out there～

data.text: The difference between Sei-chan and me…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>The difference between Sei-chan and me…?

data.text:
Unexpectedly, advancing from second place is Seiun Sky! 
From the final corner, she enters a spurt!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Unexpectedly, advancing from second place is Seiun Sky! 
<story>From the final corner, she enters a spurt!

data.text:
In the lead is Seiun Sky! Following her is King Halo! 
From wide outside, Special Week is moving up!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>In the lead is Seiun Sky! Following her is King Halo! 
<story>From wide outside, Special Week is moving up!

data.text: Haaa…! Haaa…!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Haaa…! Haaa…!

data.text: …Just a little more! Keep going… Keep goooooing～!!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…Just a little more! Keep going… Keep goooooing～!!

data.text: But it's Seiun Sky! Seiun Sky!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: <story>But it's Seiun Sky! Seiun Sky!

data.text: Seiun Sky keeps the lead and crosses the goooooal!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed: <story>Seiun Sky keeps the lead and crosses the goooooal!!

data.text:
In a spectacular end to the first leg of the Triple 
Crown, Seiun Sky claims victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>In a spectacular end to the first leg of the Triple 
<story>Crown, Seiun Sky claims victory!
